subject: feat: add independent tone editing with separate limits from text editing
body:
Add "Change Tones" action to message action sheet, separate from "Edit
Message". Tone changes use their own counter (tone_edit_count, max 5)
independent of text edit count, sharing the same 15-minute window. No
"(edited)" label shown for tone-only changes since the message content
didn't change. New ToneEditModal wraps ToneSelector in a modal with
pre-populated current tones and Save/Cancel buttons.
